bibl.title: Davis v. Davis. Command of Body
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The First Judicial District Court

div1.p: In the District Court for the first Judicial District of Washington Territory holding term at Colfax Whitman County Wash ington Territory
In the matter of the Application of Nelson Davis for the custody of Maggie Davis a minor child.
To the people of the Territory of Washington and to Sarah M Davis Greeting:

We command you, that you have the body of Maggie Davis a minor child now delivered by you, as it is assured together with the causeo fher detention before the Hon Wm G. Langford Judge fo the District Court for the first Judicial District holding terms at Colfax in Whitman County in open Court at Colfax in the County of Whitman on the 10th day of December 1888 at the hour of 10 oclock on the forenoon to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the custody of the said Maggie M Davis together with the cause of her detention of the said minor child as aforesaid and that you have then and there this writ.
Witness the Stand Wm GLangford Judge of the above entitled court
